EpiFluid Lab The dark matter of the genome -- Understand the non-coding genetic variants by multi-omics inside and outside the cells.

Publications

First author (including shared 1st authorship) or corresponding author (shared corresponding authorship) papers from the EpiFluid Lab are marked with “EpiFluidLab” tag.

The complete list of publications and their citations are available at Google Scholar
